titles.title: A bill to amend the Child Care and Development Block Grant Act of 1990 to reauthorize and update the Act, and for other purposes.
A bill to amend the Child Care and Development Block Grant Act of 1990 to reauthorize and update the Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
